snippet: JABURG--Frieda, passed away peacefully at home on June 9, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Carl. Loving mother of Gary Jaburg (Susan) and Lauren Lese (Peter). She adored her late brother Jack Ankus, and his children Stacey (Chris) and Joseph (Stephanie). Frieda was crazy about her grandchildren Zachary, Jason, Stephen, Melanie, Stephanie and Laura. Completely unique, strong, charismatic and loving, anyone lucky enough to know Frieda was drawn in by her humor and character. She will be deeply missed. Services 10am Monday at "The Riverside," 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
